channel.title: AltcoinTrading.NET Weekly Roundup
channel.description: Oh would you look at that. We didn't set any cute relevant intro for the email blast this week! It's probably because we are crypto bazzillionaires and so we don't give a flying eff about the state of our website! -- Just kidding, we probably just fucked something up. Keep it real, believe in Satoshi and follow us on Twitter @altcointrading_. What we do: ATNET cryptocurrency trading strategies and hodl strategies, the best tools for crypto trading and basic crypto OPSEC guides. Follow us on Twitter @altcointrading_

item.title: Recently Updated Articles on AltcoinTrading.NET:
item.description: Articles updated within the last week to day.
item.author: info@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KvB
item.content:encoded:
Altcoin Wallets: Tried and True, 2020 Updated

Updated at 01 Oct 2020, 03:17 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - Where to store cryptocurrencies? Best ERC20 cold storage? See a list of altcoin wallets including multicoin wallets, web based wallets and hardware wallets.

[Read it]

Wyckoff Avoidance Strategy in Cryptocurrency Trading

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - Wyckoff method of avoidance means to trade only the best stocks in the leading sectors. How to apply this motto when trading cryptocurrencies?

[Read it]

Daytrading on Crypto Markets: Good Idea?

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #CRYPTO-TRADING-TECHNIQUE - Daytrading means entering and exiting the market in a single day. Is this a good crypto trading strategy?

[Read it]

Altcoin Exchanges: Where to buy and trade crypto in 2020?

Updated at 01 Oct 2020, 03:17 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - Where to buy crypto and where to trade it? Which exchanges are liquid, which have issues and which look like exit scam? Updated 2020.

[Read it]

Script Spotlight: Bollinger Band Width

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - BBands Variations on Tradingview, focusing on Bollinger Bandwidth this time. In this series we are picking and reviewing TradingView scripts for technical analysis that recently popped up in the daily popular feed.

[Read it]

Ichimoku Cloud for Crypto Trading

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - Ichimoku cloud strategies for crypto: Full indicator tutorial, including the controversial topic - Does it make sense to tweak Ichimoku Cloud settings for crypto trading?

[Read it]

List of Crypto Trading Tools (Free and Freemium)

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #CRYPTO-TRADING-TOOLS - Curated list of tools for crypto traders, hodlers and investors.

[Read it]

Daytrading on Crypto Markets: Good Idea?

Updated at 29 Sep 2020, 04:09 UTC in #TRADING - Daytrading means entering and exiting the market in a single day. Is this a good crypto trading strategy?

[Read it]
